settings.title: Firecrest Nightscape
settings.content: Nightscape is a night photography filter designed to remove light spectrums associated with light pollution and sodium lamps.

settings.title: The Science of Light
settings.content: Formatt Hitech is the first company to apply advanced science and technology to the development of filters for digital photography and cinema. Our Firecrest coating technology allows us to manufacture filters designed for use with the ultra-high megapixel cameras on the market today. With Firecrest, we now offer the most neutral ND filters on the market, the darkest ND filters on the market, and our circular filters are offered in the thinnest rings on the market. Formatt Hitech filters are carefully crafted in the UK.

settings.title: Signature Artist Kits
settings.content: Filter kits hand selected by Formatt  Hitech Signature Artists. Use the same filters world renowned professionals use every day.

settings.title: Introducing the Firecrest 100mm Filter Holder MKII
settings.content: For the MKII, we went back to the drawing board and worked closely with an extensive team of industry leading photographers to build upon the successes of the MKI, whilst taking into account the feedback from our users in order to refine and improve upon every aspect of our holder.

settings.title: Firecrest Nightscape
settings.content: Block specific wavelengths of urban lights for stunning nightscapes
